meanings.definition: A person trained in dental hygiene.
meanings.sent1: The hygienists at the dental clinic taught me how to properly brush my teeth.
meanings.sent2: The hygienists in the office ensure that patients maintain good oral health.
meanings.sent3: The hygienists joked that they could spot someone who doesn't floss from a mile away.
meanings.sent4: The hygienists are like tooth detectives, searching for plaque and cavities.
meanings.sent5: I always remember the friendly smiles of the hygienists when I visit the dentist.

meanings.sent1: The hygienists in the dental office work together to keep the clinic clean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of hygienists walking to the conference room for a meeting.
meanings.sent3: The hygienists formed a band called 'The Clean Teeth Crew' for fun.
meanings.sent4: The hygienists, like a flock of birds, swiftly moved from one patient to another.
meanings.sent5: The hygienists' uniforms were all matching, making them look like a team of superheroes.
